thoughts on software and engineering

roles

Tags: newb
Written on October 5, 2016

Throughout my bootcamp experience at Telegraph Academy...

I kept wondering... what do software engineers do all day?

I spent the first few weeks of my job figuring it out.

To begin, we must understand how applications are structured.

"A great application has many different front ends accessing a single database."
"A great application has many different front ends accessing a single database (via API)."
This by no means means there are only one version of each site.
And of course in your development flow there will e plenty of branches.
But understanding now the different locations will help us think better about jobs.
Full Stack & Data Science
Front End & Applications
Back end & API Engineering
All at once again...
